top.title: Three Americans killed by IS gunman in Syria, US military says
top.summary: Two US soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed in the attack, according to the US Central Command.

top.title: Belarus frees 123 prisoners as US lifts sanctions
top.summary: Opposition activist Maria Kolesnikova is among those released in exchange for a deal with the US.

top.title: One million households without power in Ukraine after Russia attacks energy grid
top.summary: The latest overnight attacks come as US envoy Steve Witkoff prepares to hold more talks with Ukraine's president.

top.title: US TikTok investors in limbo as deal set to be delayed again
top.summary: A deal to sell TikTok has remained elusive, despite earlier claims that a deal was done.

top.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes
top.summary: The errors included getting dialogue wrong and incorrectly claiming a scene was set 100 years earlier than it was.

top.title: Online gaming escaped Australia's social media ban - but critics say it's just as addictive
top.summary: Parents and experts say gaming poses many of the same risks for kids as social media, and want them included.

title.#text: A Kinect for kids is outselling Xbox to become the hot console this holiday
Slab is the first MIDI controller built exclusively for Serato Studio
This $1,500 robot cooks dinner while I work
